prod_short_desc: Pack your city with a bunch of new people!
prod_long_desc:
Grow your LEGO® City population with this people pack, featuring a wide range of minifigures and endless possibilities for activities, with windsurfing and kayaking, volleyball net with ball, trees with hammock and an ice cream stand. Includes 15 minifigures plus dog, fish, dolphin and lobster figures.
Build the perfect day at the LEGO City beach, with a whole range of mini-builds and tons of special LEGO element accessories!
Includes 15 male and female minifigures, plus dog, dolphin, lobster, and fish figures
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
Special Accessories include an MP3 player, money notes, parasol, sand castle, radio, and kayak
169 pieces – For boy and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
Compatible with all LEGO® City sets – Use People Packs to populate your LEGO City
set: People pack – Fun at the beach
